updates.HtmlString: Updated marketing cards to be more accurate for set, plus set chances as 1:3 token:marketing for core sets, 2:3 for expansions, and 9:1 as of Battle for Zendikar.
Rienne, Angel of Rebirth (Buy-a-Box promo) is no longer available in boosters.
Taplands no longer appear in common slots.
Booster's basic land slot now has a chance of being replaced by a tapland.
Prerelease promos are now proper instead of using promo pack which now has its own tab.
